name: Pouch
description:
👝Pouch is a (deceptively!) simple puzzle game.
You have a set of screens to complete, but barely enough bridges to complete all of them !

Are you up to the task ?

✔️ Features (WIP)
The initial Game-Jam version has 8 levels and a total of 4 planks to use only
Rocks !
Bridges !
Boxes !
A whole lot of water !
... And of course, your trusty pouch ! (your inventory)

🕹️ Controls
Mouse to interact, arrow keys to move
